item.title: 沃尔格林为细胞和基因疗法开设新药房
item.description: 沃尔格林博姿联盟公司（Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc.）正在开设一个新中心，致力于为癌症、囊性纤维化和克罗恩病等复杂慢性病患者提供新兴的细胞和基因疗法。【原文：Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc. is opening a new center dedicated to bringing emerging cell and gene therapies to patients with complex, chronic conditions like cancer, cystic fibrosis and Crohn’s disease.】

item.title: 禁止使用信用卡和新增在线客户后，科塔克股价暴跌
item.description: 科塔克-马恒达银行有限公司（Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd. ）被禁止通过数字渠道增加新客户和发行新信用卡，导致股价暴跌。【原文：Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd. shares tumbled after it was barred from adding new customers through its digital channels and from issuing fresh credit cards.】

item.title: 日本央行会议开始，日元逼近干预点
item.description: 日元交易商正准备迎接 2022 年 9 月的重演，当时日本在央行决定重申宽松货币政策后对市场进行了干预，以支撑疲软的日元。【原文：Yen traders are bracing themselves for a redux of September 2022, when Japan intervened in the market to prop up the ailing currency in the wake of a central bank decision that reaffirmed accommodative monetary policy.】

item.title: VinFast 创始人将为电动汽车制造商的扩张再捐 10 亿美元
item.description: Vingroup 创始人 Pham Nhat Vuong 在河内举行的 Vingroup 股东大会上表示，他计划从个人财产中再拿出至少 10 亿美元给公司的电动汽车制造商部门 VinFast Auto Ltd.，为其全球扩张提供资金。【原文：Vingroup founder Pham Nhat Vuong plans to give at least $1 billion more from his personal wealth to the company’s EV maker unit VinFast Auto Ltd. to fund its global expansion, he said at Vingroup’s shareholders’ meeting in Hanoi.】

item.title: 日元突破 155 点后日本保持交易员干预警惕
item.description: 在日元兑美元跌穿 155 大关之后，日本官员对日元发出了进一步警告，这让市场参与者在央行会议和美国经济数据可能引发进一步走势之前感到紧张。【原文：Japanese officials rolled out further warnings on the yen after the currency slumped through the 155 mark against the dollar, leaving market players on edge ahead of a central bank meeting and US economic data that may trigger further moves.】

item.title: 日本股市的复苏取决于国内需求的稳固
item.description: 日本股市需要看到更多面向国内的公司加大力度，以推动股市进一步上涨，但工资和日元的前景使情况变得复杂。【原文：Japan’s stock market needs to see more domestically-oriented companies step up their game to fuel further rallies, but the outlook for wages and the yen complicates the picture.】

item.title: 美元 "破坏球 "迫使投资者向出口商寻求庇护
item.description: 美元飙升伤害了美国以外的股市，但至少有一个群体会从中获益，那就是向世界最大经济体出口的公司。【原文：The surging dollar has hurt stocks outside the US but one group at least stands to gain: companies that export to the world’s largest economy.】

item.title: 摩根大通指数日期临近，印度廉价债券脱颖而出
item.description: 印度股票价格飙升，已跻身全球最昂贵股票之列，但印度债券尽管是今年亚洲表现最好的债券，却显得相对便宜。【原文：Indian equities have soared to become among the world’s most expensive, yet its bonds appear relatively cheap despite being Asia’s best performers this year.】

item.title: 英国期货经纪商 Marex 集团首次公开募股融资 2.92 亿美元
item.description: Marex Group Plc 和这家总部位于伦敦的公司的一批股东在美国首次公开募股中筹集了约 2.92 亿美元，定价在市场范围内。【原文：Marex Group Plc and a group of the London-based firm’s shareholders raised about $292 million in a US initial public offering priced within a marketed range.】

item.title: 韩国公布卖空监控系统细节以发现非法交易
item.description: 韩国正在开发一个中央卖空监控平台，该平台可以检测机构余额的变化并识别非法交易。【原文：South Korea is developing a centralized short-selling monitoring platform that can detect changes in institutional balances and identify illegal transactions.】

item.title: 亚洲对通胀最敏感的中央银行令债券面临风险
item.description: 由于担心通胀和比索疲软，菲律宾央行希望推迟货币宽松政策，亚洲新兴市场表现最差的主权债券面临进一步下跌的风险。【原文：Emerging Asia’s worst-performing sovereign bonds are at risk of further declines as the Philippine central bank looks to delay monetary easing due to inflation fears and a weak peso.】

item.title: 曾反对恒大的瑞银分析师现在看好中国房地产
item.description: 说到中国房地产，林俊杰可谓是独行侠。【原文：When it comes to Chinese real estate, John Lam is a lone wolf.】

item.title: 日元升值令日本央行发出鹰派信号的几率上升，日本央行将按兵不动
item.description: 预计日本央行周五将维持利率设定不变，本周日元汇率跌至 34 年新低，使得日本央行更有可能淡化其保持宽松政策的立场。【原文：The Bank of Japan is forecast to keep its interest rate settings unchanged Friday, with the yen’s plunge this week to a fresh 34-year low making it more likely the bank will tone down its stance on keeping policy easy.】

item.title: 特斯拉能否摆脱困境？
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc. ）通过证明可以大量销售电池驱动的电动汽车并实现盈利，成为全球最有价值的公司之一。但在 2024 年的大部分时间里，投资者都在质疑特斯拉的前景：销量下滑、产品战略信号混乱、老化的产品线跟不上步伐等因素导致特斯拉股价暴跌。【原文：Tesla Inc. became one of the most valuable companies in the world by proving it was possible to sell battery-powered electric vehicles at a profit and in high volumes. But for much of 2024, investors have questioned Tesla’s outlook: The stock cratered amid slumping sales, confusing signals about its product strategy and concerns that its aging lineup wasn’t keeping pace.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。必和必拓（BHP）与英美资源集团（Anglo American）就收购事宜进行接触。Meta令人失望，科技股大跌。日元走软增加干预风险。美国力争在芯片研究领域击败中国。市场动向市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. BHP approaches Anglo American about a takeover. Tech shares swoon as Meta disappoints. The yen's weakening adds to intervention risk. The US pushes to beat China at chip research. Here’s what’s moving markets. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: Mamaearth 母公司在全球增长最快的美容市场押宝印度制造商品
item.description: 印度个人护理品牌 Mamaearth 的母公司、新近上市的 Honasa Consumer Ltd. 正以洋葱发油和姜黄咖喱面膜向全球增长最快的美容市场上的全球巨头发起挑战。【原文：Honasa Consumer Ltd., the newly listed parent of India’s personal-care brand Mamaearth, is taking on global giants in the world’s fastest-growing beauty market with onion hair oil and curd-and-turmeric face masks.】

item.title: 风险厌恶情绪抵消了库存减少的影响，石油维持小幅跌势
item.description: 石油保持小幅下跌，大盘的风险厌恶情绪抵消了美国库存减少的影响。【原文：Oil held a modest decline, with a risk-off tone in broader markets countering a drawdown in US stockpiles.】

item.title: 马来西亚考虑发放赌场执照以振兴森林城市
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，马来西亚正与富豪们就在森林城开设赌场一事进行早期讨论，以期重振这个耗资 1,000 亿美元的陷入困境的房地产项目，该国君主也是该项目股东之一。【原文：Malaysia is in early discussions with tycoons on opening a casino in Forest City, people familiar with the matter said, in a bid to revive the beleaguered $100 billion property project that counts the country’s monarch as one of its shareholders.】

item.title: 元拖累大型科技公司，亚洲股市将下跌：市场综述
item.description: 在 Meta Platforms 公司令人失望的前景引发人们对推动股市牛市的行业是否已经走得太远的担忧之后，亚洲股市准备低开。【原文：Asian equity markets were poised to open lower after Meta Platforms Inc.’s disappointing outlook raised concern on whether the industry that has powered the bull market in equities has run too far.】

item.title: 梅塔失误引发科技界恐慌，大额盈利迫在眉睫
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司令人失望的财报让科技投资者惶恐不安，因为未来几天股市中一些最大、最重要的公司都将发布财报。【原文：A disappointing earnings report from Meta Platforms Inc. has technology investors on edge with results from some of the stock market’s biggest and most important companies due in the coming days.】

item.title: 必和必拓集团考虑收购英美资源集团的可能性
item.description: 知情人士称，必和必拓集团（BHP Group Ltd. ）正在考虑收购英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc），这将成为今年最大的交易之一。【原文：BHP Group Ltd. is considering a potential takeover of Anglo American Plc, people with knowledge of the matter said, in what would rank as one of the year’s biggest deals.】

item.title: 美国商品期货交易委员会（CFTC）考虑直接禁止衍生品押注美国大选
item.description: 据熟悉该计划的人士透露，华尔街最高监管机构正在考虑全面禁止使用衍生品为美国大选下注，作为打击所谓事件合约的一部分。【原文：A top Wall Street regulator is considering an outright ban on using derivatives to bet on US elections as part of a crackdown on so-called event contracts, according to people familiar with the plans.】

item.title: 杰富瑞首席执行官出售 6,500 万美元股票为购买游艇提供资金
item.description: 杰富瑞金融集团（Jefferies Financial Group Inc.首席执行官里奇-汉德勒（Rich Handler）出售了其投资银行的 6500 万美元股票，部分是为了给自己买一份礼物--一艘游艇。【原文：Jefferies Financial Group Inc. Chief Executive Officer Rich Handler sold $65 million of shares in his investment bank partly to buy a present for himself — a yacht.】

item.title: 福特因电动车战略调整而销售和利润超出预期
item.description: 福特汽车公司（Ford Motor Co., Ltd.）在插电式汽车市场减速的情况下迅速调整其电动汽车战略，公布的第一季度业绩因工作用卡车销售强劲而超出预期。【原文：Ford Motor Co., rapidly retooling its electric vehicle strategy in a decelerating market for plug-ins, posted first-quarter results that beat expectations on strong sales of work trucks.】

item.title: 美国家电需求停滞不前，惠而浦裁员 1,000 人
item.description: 惠而浦公司（Whirlpool Corp.）是美泰克（Maytag）和安曼（Amana）家电品牌的所有者，由于美国家居销售放缓限制了需求，该公司正在全球范围内裁减约 1000 个受薪职位，以降低成本。【原文：Whirlpool Corp., the owner of the Maytag and Amana appliance brands, is cutting about 1,000 salaried positions worldwide to reduce costs as slow US home sales limit demand.】

item.title: 花旗银行希望为贝瑞、格拉特菲尔特交易提供 20 亿美元的一揽子债务方案
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.）和富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.【原文：Citigroup Inc. and Wells Fargo & Co. are preparing a $2 billion debt package to support Berry Global Group Inc.’s spinoff of the majority of its health, hygiene and specialties business with Glatfelter Corp., according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 艾因霍恩的 Greenlight 上季度表现逊于 "崩溃 "的股市
item.description: 大卫-艾因霍恩（David Einhorn）的绿光资本公司（Greenlight Capital）在致投资者的一封信中称，该公司在今年年初的表现逊于 "基本面崩溃 "的股市。【原文：David Einhorn’s Greenlight Capital underperformed the “fundamentally broken” stock market at the start of the year, according to a letter to investors.】

item.title: 瓦莱罗公司认为尽管多斯博卡斯公司的业务有所增长，但墨西哥燃料需求仍在增长
item.description: 瓦莱罗能源公司（Valero Energy Corp. ）预计墨西哥的燃料需求将继续增长，即使旗舰企业多斯博卡斯炼油厂（Dos Bocas refinery）将提高国内产量，而且总统候选人也提出向更多的绿色能源转变。【原文：Valero Energy Corp. expects fuel demand to grow in Mexico, even with the flagship Dos Bocas refinery set to ramp up domestic production and the presidential frontrunner proposing a shift to more green energy.】

item.title: KKR 为其最新全球基础设施基金融资 110 亿美元
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，KKR & Co.为其最新的全球基础设施基金筹集了 110 亿美元，超过了目标的一半。【原文：KKR & Co. raised $11 billion for its latest global infrastructure fund, more than half of its target, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 加纳矿工寻求终止未来全球资源公司的租约
item.description: 加纳矿工工会要求终止 Future Global Resources 有限公司的采矿租约，因为该公司缺乏投资和运营三年多前收购的 Bogoso-Prestea 金矿的资金。【原文：Ghana Mine Workers Union is demanding the termination of the mining lease of Future Global Resources Ltd. because the company lacks the finances to invest and operate the Bogoso-Prestea gold mine it acquired more than three years ago.】
